Reviews.Title: “Perfect hotel for its location”
Reviews.Author: donperico Posted by an Halcon Viajes traveler
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel family week occupying remained happy hotel normal special center acommodation move easily city basics ok confortable beds perfectly clean bathrooms maid attentive cleanliness breakfast pretty covered terrace breakfast wide rich star hotel eggs sausages bacon toast cereals fruits nutella buscuits juices croissants yogurts breakfast energy day waiter polite elevator perfect stay written reviews faced street noisy night due traffic fortunately sleep perfectly tired walk day maybe bring yourself earplugs totally recommend hotel location minute walking fontana di trevi five panteon square value money course expect luxury luxury hotel rome wonderful city lol

Reviews.Title: “Location Location Location”
Reviews.Author: girbi
Reviews.Content: hotel location rome minutes main attractions piazza di spagna trevi fountain piazza navona piazza del popolo actually spend holiday using public transport loads restaurants pizzerias nearby shopping staff hotel helpful courteous whilst breakfast tidied day

Reviews.Title: “Great Location - Good Standard Hotel”
Reviews.Author: aformosa
Reviews.Content: hotel location trevi fountain round corner spanish steps 8 mins walk via del corso linking piazza venezia piazza del popolo shopping 100 meters multitude restaurants pizzerias walking distance 4 day visit metro pantheon colosseum roman forum piazza navona vatican walking distance comfortable 3 star breakfast included price

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: MollyMary516
Reviews.Content: hotel location walk major attractions located steps trevi fountain 5 minute walk pantheon tritone hotel close barberini metro stop tritone fountain 34 block walk 5 minutes metro attractions st peters basilica vatican understand types renovated stayed assume renovated modern clean perfect couple traveling rome days little loud guests night

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel central location.”
Reviews.Author: Been_there_dk
Reviews.Content: friendly reception hotel staff nice clean drawback found lift didnt forgot close door lift fifth floor hotel entrance sorry drawback noise street maybe am lightly breakfast fine according italian standards beacon according danish standards slightly roasted crispy

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa
Reviews.Title: “Good hotel at a GREAT location”

Reviews.Content: thoroughly enjoyed stay hotel tritone situated heart rome walking distance service helpful modern clean equipped features breakfast restaurant top floor enjoyed little elevator

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location and Hi-Tech Room”
Reviews.Author: SUAlavi
Reviews.Content: corner luminous trevi fountain walking distance major piazzas save st peters basilica clean bathroom basic decent breakfast buffet honestly location hotel beat metro bus stop minutes walk solid 3 star hotel helpful staff price wont break budget

Reviews.Content: absolutely enjoyed hotel situated corner trevi fountain found centrally situated walking distance major spots helpful pleasant fashioned tiny lift fits people beautiful suitably sized busy main road windows double glazed blocked noise slept peacefully bathroom lovely huge shower breakfast excellent stayed hotel trip italy none particular charm tritone definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Pricey & Great location, but the bed was rock hard!”

Reviews.Content: stayed night cruise honeymoon hadnt organised booked min day location perfect corner trevi fountain road tour buses etc hotel overpriced offer £200 night entering hotel greeted flight stairs time porter help luggage gentleman reception austere rush serve helpful terms trains information speaking fluent english liftelevator tiny avoided using floor modernised adequate modern wood tiles clinical bathroom lovely modern althought shower tiny husband couldnt close shower cubicle door sink drainage 102 music system lighting control panel bed nice touch reviews liked couldnt music function fault ours particular balcony nice touch biggest complaint bed singles pushed double honestly hardest bed experienced enitre life bed double table rock solid convinced upholstered bed base mattress checked pillows flat pancakes uncomfortable nights sleep hear doors corridor movements hall woke morning location dont mind average service modern clinical extremely hard beds recommend hotel price breakfast nice avoid horrible orange squash tritone hotel please invest comfortable larger beds carpets minimise corridor noise dressing fresh orange juice breakfast complaints

Reviews.Content: tritone hotel perfect spot vacation centric location allows wander highlight rome depending public transports hotel surrounded plenty shopping sightseeing restaurants bars conected network transports subway 10 minutes hotel recently restructured offered basic amenities stay cleaned cosy diary soundproof breakfast takes roof garden special views day

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel I every stayed at.”
Reviews.Author: EllenBaron
Reviews.Content: service desk clerks extreamly noisy elevator service 4th floor staff waitng elevator ignored 7 nights lobby unattractive location excellent corner trevi fountain reason chose hotel reservation via internet pictures appear paid 250 american dollars night refer hotel paris london trip stayed wonderful hotels breakfast acceptable

Reviews.Content: stranded rome hotel doing research bad luck draw shower teeny moldy didnt clean frustrating day carpet gross noisy tv pay internet dirty disgusting dont
